/** * Gets a list of elements matching {@code}xpathExpression{@code}. If xpathExpression lacks * a '/' character, only immediate children o {@code}element{@code} are searched over. *
* If {@code}xpathExpression{@code} contains an '/' character, a full XPath search is made * @param element * @param xpathExpression * @return A possibly empty but non-null {@code}ArrayList{@code} * @throws XPathExpressionException */
